pkgmetadata.longdescription: # FourmatA library for batteries-included linting and autoformatting.## Installation and UsageInstall fourmat through pip:```sh$ pip install fourmat```Create a `.fourmat` file to specify the directories and files to check.```sh$ fourmat check$ fourmat fix```## Adding Fourmat as a pre-commit hookInstall the pre-commit package:```sh$ pip install pre-commit```Create a `.pre-commit-config.yaml` containing:```yamlrepos:- repo: https://github.com/4Catalyzer/fourmat rev: master # or specify a version hooks: - id: fourmat```then install the hook:```$ pre-commit install```
